file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-20-00-04 - APU ENGINE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU ENGINE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to replace parts of the Auxiliary Power Unit (APU). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) Engine Parts - ALL 49-20-00-960-801-A ♦ Replacement EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-20-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-20-00-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) Engine Parts - Replacement A. General (1) This task covers the Maintenance Plan requirements related to the discard tasks of the internal APU engine parts. (2) To comply with these requirements, it is necessary to replace the applicable parts when the APU engine is sent to shop. (3) The instructions to replace these parts are given in PW Canada engine manual instructions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 20-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-10-01-000-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-10-01-400-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-14-01-000-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-14-01-400-801-A/400 AUXILIARY POWER UNIT (APU) - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/400 49-20-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 840-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 or AMM MPP 49-02-00/200, as applicable) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Do the procedure to make the aircraft safe for maintenance (AMM MPP 20-00-00/200). SUBTASK 920-002-A (2) Remove the APU ( AMM TASK 49-10-01-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 49-14-01-000-801-A/400, as applicable) J. APU Engine Internal Parts - Discard SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Replace the applicable parts when the APU engine is sent to shop. The instructions to replace these parts are given in PW Canada engine manual instructions. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 400-002-A (1) Install the APU ( AMM TASK 49-10-01-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 49-14-01-400-801-A/400, as applicable) SUBTASK 940-002-A (2) Do the procedure to restore the aircraft after the maintenance procedures (AMM MPP 20-00-00/200).
